directions: In a large wooden bowl, using a wooden spoon, mash chopped garlic cloves to a fine paste with salt.
Whisk in lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce, and anchovy paste.
Whisk in egg yolk until well blended, then slowly whisk in olive oil until creamy.
Mix in Parmesan cheese until dressing is thickened and creamy.
Add romaine lettuce once you are ready to serve and toss to coat leaves thoroughly with dressing.
Top with croutons and additional Parmesan cheese if desired.
ingredients: 1 head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-sized pieces
